entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
